title: How to add VirtualBox VMs from a previous installation
description: If you've re-installed your operating system (or moved to a new machine) and you have a collection of VirtualBox virtual machines on a secondary drive, you can easily add them one at a time.

title: Generative AI: Just don't call it an 'artist' say scholars in Science magazine
description: Generative AI programs "misleadingly imply that these systems exhibit humanlike intent," write AI researchers, when in fact, "there is little room for autonomous machines being 'artists' or 'creative' in their own right."

title: Tech HR professionals are using ChatGPT to craft termination letters
description: Over half of tech HR employees are using ChatGPT at work - for all kinds of things.

title: This free AI tool can write your cover letters, and its easier to use than ChatGPT
description: When looking for a job, you're likely applying to several positions at a time -- each requiring a uniquely hand-crafted application. Cover Letter Copilot has you covered.

title: How to automatically clear the Bitwarden clipboard for better security
description: If you really want to get the most out of your Bitwarden password manager, you should seriously consider keeping your clipboard clear of entries.

title: Everyone loves low-code/no-code development, but not all are ready for it
description: Technology leaders are nervous about the ability of low-code and no-code applications to solve key business challenges.

title: Get a Windows 11 Pro license for $30 to upgrade your security and work features
description: Save $170 on a Microsoft Windows 11 Pro license to get upgraded features for power users.

title: AT&T is selling the Motorola Razr Plus for $180 - no strings attached
description: This might be the most affordable phone offer yet, at an $820 discount.

title: Gmail will help you write your emails now: How to access Google's new AI tool
description: The feature was originally announced in May and just went live for iPhone, iPad, and Android.

title: You can get a share of Google's $23 million dollar settlement. Here's how
description: After being accused of sharing users' searches with third-party websites, Google agrees to pay up, despite denying culpability. You may be able to cash in.

title: Everything you need to start building a smart home
description: We've got a tech reporter's guide to the best smart home gear that will help you automate your daily routines.

title: Everything you need to host a summer party
description: Here's what you need to host the ultimate outdoor summer party.

title: Beyerdynamic launches its loudest speaker ever -- and it's made for hybrid workers
description: The Space Max is the picture of versatility, with a minimal, award-winning design, and full-duplex audio quality.

title: How to optimize your Gmail inbox layout (and why you might want to)
description: If you don't find the default Gmail inbox to your liking, here's how to make it suit your workflow and taste.

title: Serving Generative AI just got a lot easier with OctoML's OctoAI
description: Generative AI, because of its compute intensity, is especially hard to put into production. OctoML says it can streamline all of that with its years of optimization expertise.

title: Intel rebrands its product line ahead of Core Ultra processor launch
description: With this announcement, the company teases the upcoming launch of the new Intel Core Ultra processors.

title: Let Elsa be your new Alexa: Amazon adds 'Hey Disney!' voice assistant
description: The company partnered with Disney to develop what it is calling the 'Disney Magical Companion' for Echo devices.

title: This is the $400 Android phone to beat in 2023 - and it even has a stylus
description: Motorola's Moto G Stylus 5G (2023) sees notable feature improvements and a more reasonable price tag, possibly enough to beat Samsung and Google at their own game.

title: OpenAI announces updates to API, including improved function calling capabilities
description: The company behind ChatGPT also announced up to 25% lower prices effective immediately.
